backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking contrast-related UI updates to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light/dark OKLCH color tokens and global background/foreground behavior.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up global providers and TanStack Router routes for all main pages.
frontend/src/cart/CartProvider.tsx: Cart context managing item storage, quantity updates, and localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Mobile bottom navigation bar with icons and a dynamic cart badge.
frontend/src/components/BrandProvider.ts: Brand context handling editable brand name and logo with localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with editable brand name, logo upload support, menu toggling, and fallback logo handling.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Product card showing image, pricing, optional quantity controls, and add‑to‑cart actions.
Horizontal scrollable carousel that renders ProductCard components with optional quantity controls and left/right scroll buttons.
frontend/src/data/products.ts: Defines the Product interface and exports categorized product lists for theplas and other items along with product category names.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s Internet Identity, recreating and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading stored identities, handling login/logout, and exposing status flags.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables, global styles, scrollbar hiding, and font import.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AccountPage.tsx: Displays a guest account overview with links to contact, FAQ, and placeholder sections for saved items and addresses.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Renders the shopping cart with item management, quantity controls, totals, and an empty-cart fallback.
frontend/src/pages/CategoriesPage.tsx: Shows product categories by rendering carousels for each thepla category and a separate section for other products.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a contact page with phone, location, email, and Instagram inputs using React and Tailwind.
frontend/src/pages/FaqPage.tsx: Displays a list of FAQs with expandable items controlled by component state.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the homepage with a hero section, story content, and a Buy Now button that adds a default product to the cart.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Shows a list of static notifications with icons and fallback UI when none are available.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature requests, and current state for text contrast improvements.
